TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit AggregateTokenResolver extends System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenResolver

Docs.summary: 表示可包裝多個權杖解析程式的安全性權杖解析程式，而且可跨所有包裝的解析程式解析權杖。

remarks.format: ## Remarks A<xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenResolver>物件都代表一個公用程式類別，可擷取安全性權杖或金鑰時，您有金鑰識別碼或金鑰識別碼子句。 <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.AggregateTokenResolver>包裝數個<xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenResolver>物件。 建構函式中指定要包裝的語彙基元解析程式。 <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.AggregateTokenResolver.TokenResolvers%2A>屬性傳回的集合會彙總的解析程式所包裝的語彙基元解析程式。

MemberSignature.Value: public AggregateTokenResolver (System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable<System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenResolver> tokenResolvers);

.method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(class System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable`1<class System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenResolver> tokenResolvers) cil managed
Public Sub New (tokenResolvers As IEnumerable(Of SecurityTokenResolver))
public: AggregateTokenResolver(System::Collections::Generic::IEnumerable<System::IdentityModel::Selectors::SecurityTokenResolver ^> ^ tokenResolvers);

Docs.param: 要由此執行個體所包裝之安全性權杖解析程式的清單。
Docs.summary: 使用指定的權杖解析程式清單，初始化 類別的新執行個體。

remarks.format: ## Remarks <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.AggregateTokenResolver.TokenResolvers%2A>屬性會初始化與指定語彙基元解析程式的清單。

MemberSignature.Value: public System.Collections.ObjectModel.ReadOnlyCollection<System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenResolver> TokenResolvers { get; }
.property instance class System.Collections.ObjectModel.ReadOnlyCollection`1<class System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenResolver> TokenResolvers
Public ReadOnly Property TokenResolvers As ReadOnlyCollection(Of SecurityTokenResolver)

public: property System::Collections::ObjectModel::ReadOnlyCollection<System::IdentityModel::Selectors::SecurityTokenResolver ^> ^ TokenResolvers { System::Collections::ObjectModel::ReadOnlyCollection<System::IdentityModel::Selectors::SecurityTokenResolver ^> ^ get(); };

Docs.summary: 取得由此執行個體所包裝之安全性權杖解析程式。
Docs.value: 包含這個執行個體所包裝之語彙基元解析程式的唯讀集合。

MemberSignature.Value: protected override bool TryResolveSecurityKeyCore (System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityKeyIdentifierClause keyIdentifierClause, out System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityKey key);

.method familyhidebysig virtual instance bool TryResolveSecurityKeyCore(class System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityKeyIdentifierClause keyIdentifierClause, [out] class System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityKey& key) cil managed
Protected Overrides Function TryResolveSecurityKeyCore (keyIdentifierClause As SecurityKeyIdentifierClause, ByRef key As SecurityKey) As Boolean

protected: override bool TryResolveSecurityKeyCore(System::IdentityModel::Tokens::SecurityKeyIdentifierClause ^ keyIdentifierClause, [Runtime::InteropServices::Out] System::IdentityModel::Tokens::SecurityKey ^ % key);

Docs.param: 要為其擷取金鑰的金鑰識別碼子句。
當這個方法回傳時，會包含在指定之金鑰識別碼子句中所參考的金鑰。 這個參數會以未初始化的狀態傳遞。
Docs.summary: 嘗試擷取在指定之金鑰識別碼子句中所參考的金鑰。
Docs.returns: 如果可以擷取指定之金鑰識別碼子句的金鑰，則為 ，否則為 。

remarks.format: ## Remarks <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.AggregateTokenResolver.TryResolveSecurityKeyCore%2A> 方法會被 <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenResolver.TryResolveSecurityKey%2A> 和 <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenResolver.ResolveSecurityKey%2A> 方法呼叫。

MemberSignature.Value: protected override bool TryResolveTokenCore (System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityKeyIdentifier keyIdentifier, out System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityToken token);

.method familyhidebysig virtual instance bool TryResolveTokenCore(class System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityKeyIdentifier keyIdentifier, [out] class System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityToken& token) cil managed
Protected Overrides Function TryResolveTokenCore (keyIdentifier As SecurityKeyIdentifier, ByRef token As SecurityToken) As Boolean

protected: override bool TryResolveTokenCore(System::IdentityModel::Tokens::SecurityKeyIdentifier ^ keyIdentifier, [Runtime::InteropServices::Out] System::IdentityModel::Tokens::SecurityToken ^ % token);

Docs.param: 要為其擷取權杖的安全性金鑰識別項。
當這個方法回傳時，會包含表示指定之金鑰識別碼的權杖。 這個參數會以未初始化的狀態傳遞。
Docs.summary: 嘗試擷取安全性權杖，這個安全性權杖至少與指定之金鑰識別項內含的其中一個金鑰識別項子句相符。
Docs.returns: 如果可以擷取指定之金鑰識別碼的權杖，則為 ，否則為 。

remarks.format: ## Remarks <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.AggregateTokenResolver.TryResolveTokenCore%2A> 方法會被 <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenResolver.TryResolveToken%2A> 和 <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenResolver.ResolveToken%2A> 方法呼叫。

MemberSignature.Value: protected override bool TryResolveTokenCore (System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityKeyIdentifierClause keyIdentifierClause, out System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityToken token);

.method familyhidebysig virtual instance bool TryResolveTokenCore(class System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityKeyIdentifierClause keyIdentifierClause, [out] class System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityToken& token) cil managed
Protected Overrides Function TryResolveTokenCore (keyIdentifierClause As SecurityKeyIdentifierClause, ByRef token As SecurityToken) As Boolean

protected: override bool TryResolveTokenCore(System::IdentityModel::Tokens::SecurityKeyIdentifierClause ^ keyIdentifierClause, [Runtime::InteropServices::Out] System::IdentityModel::Tokens::SecurityToken ^ % token);

Docs.param: 要為其建立安全性權杖的金鑰識別碼子句。
當這個方法回傳時，會包含表示指定之金鑰識別碼子句的安全性權杖。 這個參數會以未初始化的狀態傳遞。
Docs.summary: 嘗試解析與指定之金鑰識別項子句相符的安全性權杖。
Docs.returns: 如果可以擷取指定之金鑰識別碼子句的安全性權杖，則為 ，否則為 。

remarks.format: ## Remarks <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.AggregateTokenResolver.TryResolveTokenCore%2A> 方法會被 <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenResolver.TryResolveToken%2A> 和 <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenResolver.ResolveToken%2A> 方法呼叫。
